bibl.title: Integrating History and Health for the Roman Period of Ancient Egypt.
in collaboration with Lyla PINCH BROCK, Egyptology at the Dawn of the Twenty-first Century. Proceedings of the Eighth International Congress of Egyptologists, Cairo, 2000. Volume 2: History, Religion
bibl.author: TUCKER, Teri L.

bibl.note: The skeletal material from 6 tombs from the "Valley of the Golden Mummies" (Bahariya Oasis, IInd cent. A.D.): a brief account of the evidence for infections, arthritis, trauma, and caries.
bibl.seg: TUCKER Teri L. and Zahi HAWASS, Integrating History and Health for the Roman Period of Ancient Egypt.

Zahi HAWASS (Ed.), in collaboration with Lyla PINCH BROCK, Egyptology at the Dawn of the Twenty-first Century. Proceedings of the Eighth International Congress of Egyptologists, Cairo, 2000. Volume 2: History, Religion (Cairo - New York, 2003) pp. 543-547, 3 figg., 1 carte.
